name: Delivery Note Item Wise
query:
SELECT 
    dn.name AS 'Name',
    dn.territory AS 'Territory',
    dn.customer AS 'Customer', 
    dn.customer_name AS 'Customer Name', 
    dn.posting_date AS 'Posting Date', 
    dn.posting_time AS 'Posting Time', 
    dni.against_sales_order AS 'Against Sales Order', 
    dn.status AS 'Status', 
    dni.item_name AS 'Item Name', 
    dni.qty AS 'Quantity', 
    dni.rate AS 'Rate', 
    dni.amount AS 'Amount'
FROM 
    `tabDelivery Note` dn 
JOIN 
    `tabDelivery Note Item` dni ON dni.parent = dn.name 
WHERE 
    dn.company IN ("Unit 6", "Unit 5", "Unit 5B", "Unit 15", "Unit 8") 
    AND dn.docstatus = 1 
   AND dn.posting_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
